mapper.select: select lt.id as id ,trip_name,address,level_name,phone,price,picImg,info from l_shoucang ls left join l_trip lt on ls.trip_id=lt.id left join l_level le on le.id=lt.level_id where ls.user_id=#{userId}
select trip_id from l_shoucang where user_id=#{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from l_shoucang where trip_id=#{tripId} and user_id=#{userId}
